hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /src git pull docker run -i --rm -v /root/.m2:/root/.m2 -v /workspace/jee-sample-with-pipeline:/usr/src/mymaven -w /usr/src/mymaven maven:3.2-jdk-8 mvn clean install docker run -i --rm -v /root/.m2:/root/.m2 -v /workspace/jee-sample-with-pipeline:/usr/src/mymaven -w /usr/src/mymaven maven:3.2-jdk-8 chmod -R a+rw /usr/src/mymaven/target
